content.raw:
We can handle this cases just using a proper alias. The package name won't be used for anymore that bibucket repositories if the alias is present.
In this case, ign_math is really using ignition-math as a package name, so the command should:

``` release.py ign_math <version> <token> -a ignition-math --ignition-repo```

In fact, [this PR](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-request/43/security-check-to-avoid-releasing-packages/diff) should help to detect the cases and fix them before running the release.

We can handle this cases just using a proper alias. The package name won't be used for anymore that bibucket repositories if the alias is present. In this case, ign_math is really using ignition-math as a package name, so the command should:

release.py ign_math <version> <token> -a ignition-math --ignition-repo

In fact, this PR should help to detect the cases and fix them before running the release.
